summary: My main driver is to continuously develop (myself and my team) and learn. Push the bar a bit every day. I love to work and play hard. I enjoy and thrive in complex environments, settings and challenges and seek to find a path to simplicity and effectiveness. I am self-motivated, strive to overachieve set goals and have a just do it mentality.

projects.title: Cube Data Centre Product Development
projects.description:
Project Manager & Strategic Consultant
An evolutionary way of looking at data centres. A concept that on one hand fulfills the need for data centres with low capital expenditures, low operational expenditures and low risks. On the other hand a concept that if required can accommodate high density equipment and strongly reduces the size of the data centre. That’s what we call building opportunities.

projects.title: Amsterdam Central Station - IJ-hal
projects.description: I was the lead mechanical engineer and PM assistent for this project. Deerns was responsible for the engineering of the mechanical and electrical systems and for the building physics. In addition, Deerns carried out a climate study for the entire station and a thorough examination of the fire safety aspects. Modified solutions were developed for the various areas, designed to meet the needs of shoppers and of visitors to the station.

projects.title: Amsterdam Central Station - Poortvrije Passage
projects.description: I was the lead mechanical engineer and PM assistant for this project. The two passages, the IJ Passage and the Amstel Passage, form a gate-free connection (that is, where no public transport pass or ticket is required for access) between the rear of the station, facing the River IJ, and the front, facing the city centre. Deerns was responsible for the engineering of the mechanical and electrical systems and for the building physics. In addition, Deerns carried out a climate study for the entire station and a thorough examination of the fire safety aspects. Modified solutions were developed for the various areas, designed to meet the needs of shoppers and of visitors to the station.

profile_positions.description: Enjoying life and travelling around the world with my wife and son.
profile_positions.title: Exploring the World - Travelling

profile_positions.description:
Director of the International Data Centre Practice. Responsibilities included:
•	Member of the International Management Team
•	The global data centre strategy (development & execution)
•	Proposition development (marketing, unique selling points, innovations)
•	Coaching and development of team members
•	Service development & positioning
•	Coordination of the international activities & accounts
•	Knowledge management, development & sharing across all the teams
•	International development (market intelligence, business, resources & partnerships) 
•	International sales & Project acquisition
•	Ensuring the quality of the delivered projects globally
•	Strategic consultant in selected projects
profile_positions.title: Director International Data Centre Practice

profile_positions.description:
Assistant to the International Practice Director and Account Manager.

Responsibilities included:
•	Acquisition of new clients (cold & warm acquisition)
•	Actively monitoring and anticipating to market and client developments
•	Visiting & presenting at conferences
•	Coordination and development proposals for new projects
•	Development of new services
•	Pitching to new clients
•	Manage international sales coordination & strategies
profile_positions.title: International Data Centre Practice Assistant Director

profile_positions.description:
Project Leader key responsibilities:
•	Primary client & partner interface
•	Managing multi-disciplinary teams (mechanical, electrical, control & automation, building physics)
•	Quality monitoring
•	Provide technical guidance and mentoring to team members
•	Financial reports
•	Presenting design decisions to stakeholders
•	Actively monitoring and managing the project progress and finances

Senior Mechanical Engineer key responsibilities: 
•	Lead mechanical design activities and assist in cross discipline coordination
•	Manage the discipline/project resources including deliverables production
•	Grow and develop the team using internal resources and strategic hires to ensure successful project delivery
•	Provide technical guidance and mentoring to junior team members
•	Coordinate the production of reports and specifications
•	Engage with the client, project end-users and contractors
•	Join and/or lead project and design team meetings
•	Assist tender activities
•	Review design and construction programs and highlight key risks
•	Review and input to commissioning plans
•	Spend time on site during construction and commissioning phases
•	Develop and nurture client relationships that deliver further opportunities
profile_positions.title: Project Manager & Senior Mechanical Engineer
Experienced Mechanical Engineer & Project Manager Assistant

profile_positions.description:
Speaker & presenter at various congress, including:
•	2017 – UK Trade Mission DDA - Data Centres to the Netherlands: “Dutch Approach to Innovation” 
•	2017 - Cebit DcSpeaker’s Corner: “Bring concepts to life” 
•	2016 - Keynote at International Federation of Hospital Engineering: “Healthcare & Data Centres - Why is Reliability Essential for Your Future?”
•	2015 - DataCenterDynamics Istanbul: “Turkcell Gebze: Transformation of Data Centre Business Strategy by Design into Reality” 
•	2015 - Datacloud Europe Monaco: “A Tier III Data Centre for Less Than 4€ per Watt IT Power”
•	2014 - DataCenterDynamics Istanbul: “Accurately Determining Total Cost of Ownership to Future Proof Your Data Centre Investment”
•	2014 - DataCenterDynamics Sao Paulo: “Accurately Determining Total Cost of Ownership to Future Proof Your Data Centre Investment”
•	2014 - Green Building Council Brazil: “Sustainable Strategies in Data Centres: Concepts & Business Cases”
profile_positions.title: Congress Speaker
